isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 26-SI SERIES - REPAIR PROCEDURES - FIELD COIL CHECKS

svcproc.title: FIELD COIL CHECKS
svcproc.para: To check for grounds, connect an ohmmeter to the field coil leads and to the end frame ( Item A, Figure 7). If the ohmmeter reading is low, the field coil is grounded.

calloutgroup.callout1: A. CHECKING FIELD COIL FOR GROUNDS = OPEN
B. CHECKING FIELD COILS FOR SHORTS AND OPENS = 2.4 - 2.8 OHMS
D. CHECKING STATOR FOR GROUNDS = OPEN
E. CHECKING STATOR FOR OPENS = OPENS, ALL THE SAME

svcproc.para: To check for opens, connect an ohmmeter to the two field coil leads ( Item B, Figure 7). If the ohmmeter reading is high (infinite), the field coil is open.

To check the winding for short circuits, connect an ohmmeter to the field coil. If the resistance reading is below the specified value, the winding is shorted. The specified resistance is listed under SPECIFICATIONS.
